§ 1320c–6. akn:subsection.akn:heading: Reimbursement by Secretary for expenses incurred in defense of legal proceedings

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Reimbursement by Secretary for expenses incurred in defense of legal proceedings The Secretary shall make payment to an organization under contract with him pursuant to this part, or to any member or employee thereof, or to any person who furnishes legal counsel or services to such organization, in an amount equal to the reasonable amount of the expenses incurred, as determined by the Secretary, in connection with the defense of any suit, action, or proceeding brought against such organization, member, or employee related to the performance of any duty or function under such contract by such organization, member, or employee.
